tweet: We're thrilled to have released the much improved initial implementation of the ChainLink Node in Golang;  https://t.co/YPRRvkRot3. We're excited about its speed, ease of use, and the reliability with which you can now connect smart contracts to key APIs and off-chain computation.

This poor muskrat in #needham was stuck upside down at the bottom of a chainlink fence. It took a little finesse, but ARL Rescue Services was able to get him free and send him on his way unharmed!  https://t.co/Pr0wJIuSPm
